Text.Page:
Bloody prions drove us out of the field. We dropped everything and ran. And I do mean everything. Now all our tools are out there, and we're here.

Can you find them before something big and ugly steps on them?
You found them! And they're not broken! This is a good day, <PCNAME>.
I'm afraid something's going to happen to our excavation tools if they're out there much longer.
